title: Pacha Style Lounge Chair Gold/Pink
body: Curved and shaped like clouds, this Mobelaris style of the Pacha Lounge Chair gives a relaxing vibe to any styled home. A 1975 original of renowned French furniture and interior designer, Pierre Paulin, that creates the feeling of floating in clouds, combining comfort and creative style. This iconic lounge chair lends 70's elegance to any room.
